ARABIC: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ إِذَا مَسَّهُمْ طَٰٓئِفٌ مِّنَ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنِ تَذَكَّرُوا۟ فَإِذَا هُم مُّبْصِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who have taqwa, when they are bothered by visitors from Shaytan, they remember and immediately see clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily those who fear God think of Him when assailed by the instigations of Satan, and lo! they begin to understand,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If the God-fearing are instigated by any suggestion of Satan, they instantly become alert, whereafter they clearly perceive the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When a satanic thought starts to bother the pious ones, they understand and see the light
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed those who fear get alerted whenever a temptation from the devil troubles them, and they perceive immediately.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, those who have Taqwa, when an evil thought comes to them from Shaytan, they remember (Allah), and (indeed) they then see (aright).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those who guard (against evil), when a visitation from the Shaitan afflicts them they become mindful, then lo! they see.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The godfearing, when a visitation of Satan troubles them, remember, and then see clearly;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who ward off (evil), when a glamour from the devil troubleth them, they do but remember (Allah's Guidance) and behold them seers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When any evil suggestion from Satan touches those who fear God, they are instantly alerted and become watchful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily those who fear God when an instigation from the Satan toucheth them, they call to mind land lo! they are enlightened.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When those who are Godwary are touched by a visitation of Satan, they remember [Allah] and, behold, they perceive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who fear Allah, when a thought of evil from Satan assaults them, bring Allah to remembrance, when lo! they see (aright)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, those who are Al-Muttaqun (the pious - see V. 2:2), when an evil thought comes to them from Shaitan (Satan), they remember (Allah), and (indeed) they then see (aright).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, when a visitation of satan touches the cautious (worshipers) they remember, and then see clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who are righteous—when an impulse from Satan strikes them, they remind themselves, and immediately see clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, those who fear Allah - when an impulse touches them from Satan, they remember [Him] and at once they have insight.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:201] Truly the God-fearing, when a visitation from Satan touches them, befalls them (tayfun: a variant reading has tā’ifun), that is, [when] something [of the sort] overcomes them, they remember, God’s punishment and His reward, and then see clearly, [distinguishing] the truth from what is other than it, and so they return [to God].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 181 (Lo! those who ward off (evil)) those who ward off the whispering of the devil, (when a glamour) doubt and insinuation (from the devil troubles them) befalls them, (they do but remember) know ((Allah's guidance) and behold them seers) refraining from transgression!
